text: يَقۡدُمُ قَوۡمَهُۥ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ فَأَوۡرَدَهُمُ ٱلنَّارَۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡوِرۡدُ ٱلۡمَوۡرُودُ

translation.en: He will precede his people on the Day of Resurrection and lead them into the Fire; and wretched is the place to which they are led
translation.id: Dia (Fir'aun) berjalan di depan kaumnya di hari Kiamat, lalu membawa mereka masuk ke dalam neraka. Neraka itu seburuk-buruk tempat yang dimasuki
